verses.name: 2 Samuel 14:1
verses.text: Now Joab the son of Zeruiah perceived that the king’s heart was toward Absalom.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 14:2
verses.text: And Joab sent to Tekoah, and fetched thence a wise woman, and said unto her, I pray thee, feign thyself to be a mourner, and put on now mourning apparel, and anoint not thyself with oil, but be as a woman that had a long time mourned for the dead:

verses.name: 2 Samuel 14:3
verses.text: And come to the king, and speak on this manner unto him. So Joab put the words in her mouth.
